amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 204 (Roll no. 331).
